main event: On 18 April 1948, 1st Lt. observed a flying disc over Fairbanks, Alaska.
interesting points: The object oscillated from a horizontal plane to a vertical plane at high speed,The object was reported at an altitude of 2000-3000 feet,The sighting lasted only a few minutes,The object was described as round and flat with a silvery color,No sound was emitted from the object.
